__e: Al, what... what if I have to live the next 40 years as a Mafia don?
Not a good idea, crossing the local warlord.
I don't think that should be a problem as long as we get permission from the head of the company... me.
She thinks that I'm not capable of crime-bossery.
There's one thing nobody can escape from, it don't matter how big a master criminal you are.
You mean to tell me you make a deal with this Vegas gang lord, you tell him, "l owe you one," and then you stiff him?
